Articles.Content:
Just my first little post and i thought id make it a challenge,

For this Challenge you must atleast orbit every Planet in the Kerbol System, using a SSTO

Rules:

1. No decoupling

2.Take pictures, Or make a video of every one,

3. Have Fun trying to do the challenge!

If you want to use mods there are 2 mods i allow.

1. Space Plane+

2.Mechjeb (No AutoPilot Though)

Also, Refueling is allowed, so you may want to add a docking port.

Well, Good luck guys!

Sorry if its a bit to hard :3
Impossible unless you are bored enough do do this with ion engines.

I do not think it is impossible, because refuelling is allowed.

However it is still not going to be any fast, indeed.
